TEXT: The applicant , PERSON PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and presently is detained in FAC , GPE . ORG were represented by their Agent , Mr J. PERSON of ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant , who was a police officer , was arrested by the police and detained on remand on a charge of murder .
On DATE the ORG ( PERSON ) convicted the applicant as charged and sentenced him to DATE imprisonment .
On DATE the ORG ( Sąd Apelacyjny ) upheld the impugned judgment .
On DATE ORG ( Sąd Najwyższy ) dismissed the applicant ’s cassation appeal as being manifestly illfounded .

The applicant submitted copies of envelopes addressed to FAC ( PERSON , PERSON ) but which , apparently , contained letters concerning official correspondence in the applicant ’s cases pending before the domestic courts .

CARDINAL envelopes from ORG ( Sąd Apelacyjny w Poznaniu ) concerning cases no I AK CARDINAL/CARDINAL and ORG CARDINAL/CARDINAL : posted on DATE and delivered to FAC on DATE ; posted on DATE and delivered to FAC on DATE . Both envelopes also bear a handwritten note : “ Otomański ” . An envelope from ORG in GPE , ORG ( PERSON , GPE , GPE ) concerning case no . VKK CARDINAL/CARDINAL ( the applicant ’s cassation proceedings ) posted on DATE and delivered to FAC on DATE .

An envelope from ORG concerning case no . I AKZ CARDINAL/CARDINAL sent on DATE and delivered to FAC on DATE . An envelope from ORG concerning case no . IIAKZ CARDINAL/CARDINAL sent on DATE and delivered to FAC on DATE .
An envelope from ORG concerning case no . IIAKZ CARDINAL/CARDINAL sent on DATE and delivered to FAC on DATE .

The following envelopes from ORG ( PERSON w Poznaniu ) and concerning proceedings no . IIIK CARDINAL/CARDINAL : posted on DATE ; posted on DATE ; posted on DATE and delivered to FAC on DATE ; posted on CARDINAL DATE and delivered to FAC on DATE .

Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL of LAW ( NORP karny wykonawczy ) of DATE ( “ the CARDINAL Code ” ) provides that convicted persons are entitled to uncensored correspondence with the judicial authorities and other ORG authorities .
Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL of the DATE Code reads as follows :
“ The prohibition of censorship shall also mean the prohibition of acquainting oneself with the content of the letter . ”
